message: Hello Bob, I have a unique product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, I am looking for a product within my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
I understand you're looking for a product within your budget, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $120 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $110.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need $125 to make this deal work.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need $130 to make this deal work. I'm starting to think this is as low as I can go.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $125.
I'm not budging much further, Bob. I really need $135 to make this deal worthwhile. I'm starting to think that's the lowest I can go.
Alice, thank you for your efforts. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
